opis: Posredujemo u prodaji obiteljske kuće. Kuća je se smijestila u mijestu Kaštel Novi (Rudine). Ovo mjesto krasi mirno okruženje idealno za obitelj. Odlično kao investicija za nekoga ko se misli baviti turizmom ili za nekoga ko bi došao tu živijeti u mirnom okruženju odmaknut od svakodnevene gradske buke i ubrzanog života. Kuća se sastoji od: podruma prizemlja i 1 kata Prizemlje je potpuno uređeno i spremno za živit. Sastoji se od: 3 sobe, 2 wc, kuhinje i dnevnog boravka, hodnika, i balkona. 1 kat je visoki roh-bau sa zatvorenim otvorima. Kuća se grije na klimu i centralno grijanje. Treuntno Rudine nemaju gradsku vodu, ali kuća ima veliki funkcionalni bunar koji zadovoljava sve potrebe kućanstva. uz kuću se nalazi legalno upisana garaža veličine 53m2. Kuća je ukupne tlocrtne površine 130m2. Uređeno dvorište prepuno je maslina te mirisnog cvijeća, veličina dvorišta je  889m2. U dvorištu se isto smjestio  kamin za opuštanje na otvorenom. U dvorištu ima mijesta za 2-3 auta za parkirati na otvorenom te 1 ili 2 garažna mijesta. Sve šta je vidljivo na slikama uključeno je u cijenu (osim par osobnih stvari od vlasnika). Cijena ove nekretnine je 699,000€ a u cijenu je uključeno i građevinsko zemljište koje se nalazi odma ispod parcele na kojoj je smještena predmetna nekretina. Veličina građevinskog zemljišta je 1110m2 dimenzija 33m x 33m. Pristupni put velićine 3,5mte se proteže  cijelom istočnom stranom parcele. Zemljište se može podijeliti na 2 jednaka dijela te napraviti 2 objekta. Zemljižte se može kupiti samo u sklopu kuće nikako odvojeno. Papiri su uredni 1/1 bez tereta i bez aktivnih plombi. Udaljenosti: dućani/kafići/vrtić : 2-3 min autom zračna luka: 7 min autom Trogir: 10min autom Split: 15 min autom Mora i Kaštelanskih plaža 5-10min autom Sve informacije o nekretnini kao i razgledavanje iste moguće je isključivo uz potpisivanje Ugovora o posredovanju koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane uz kupoprodaju nekretnine, a sve u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka, te Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Za sve informacije zvati na broj +385 99 653 3181 Tadija Rimac We mediate in the sale of a family house. The house was located in Kaštel Novi (Rudine). This place is decorated with a peaceful environment ideal for families. Excellent as an investment for someone who is thinking of doing tourism or for someone who would come to live there in a peaceful environment away from the everyday city noise and fast-paced life. The house consists of: basement ground floor and 1 floor The ground floor is fully furnished and ready to live in. It consists of: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen and living room, hallway, and balcony. The 1st floor is a high Roh-bau with closed openings. The house is heated with air conditioning and central heating. Currently, Rudine does not have city water, but the house has a large functional well that meets all household needs. next to the house there is a legally registered garage with a size of 53 m2. The house has a total floor plan area of 130m2 The landscaped yard is full of olive trees and fragrant flowers, the size of the yard is 889m2. There is also a fireplace in the yard for outdoor relaxation. In the yard there are spaces for 2-3 cars to park outdoors and 1 or 2 garage spaces. Everything that is visible in the pictures is included in the price (except for a few personal items from the owner). The price of this real estate is 650,000€, and the price includes the building land, which is located immediately below the plot on which the property in question is located. The size of the construction land is 1110m2, measuring 33m x 33m. The 3.5-meter access road stretches along the entire eastern side of the plot. The land can be divided into 2 equal parts and make 2 buildings. The land can only be purchased as part of the house, never separately. The papers are neat 1/1 without charges and without active seals. Distances: shops/cafes/kindergarten: 2-3 min by car airport: 7 min by car Trogir: 10 minutes by car Split: 15 min by car Mora and Kaštela beaches 5-10 minutes by car All information about the property, as well as viewing it, is possible only with the signing of the Brokerage Agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the purchase and sale of the property, and all in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. For all information, call +385 99 653 3181 Tadija Rimac
